title: Particles in a box: novel design and evaluation of an adaptable engineering control enclosure for a common split tube furnace to eliminate occupational exposure to refractory ceramic insulation fibers
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00041A, Paper

Nina Z. Janković, Wei Lee Leong, Andrew I. Ryan, Omar N. Tantawi, Brian S. Smith, Desiree L. Plata
Split tube furnaces routinely used in nanotechnology laboratories to generate C-based nanomaterials rely on refractory ceramic insulation fibers, which can pose an inhalation risk to operators.
